name: writingpro
description: WritingPro is an application that will allow IELTS students who wish to improve their composition ability to obtain feedback on their writing output in a personalized, and timely manner.
author: Eunbee Lee, Jose Aguilar, Erwin Joshua Manuel, Dirk Brandon Lapitan, Aiturgan Suiunbai Kyzy, Heesoo Lim, Jihyeok Kim, Ethan Kyle San Juan-Cheong
